website_summaries.verdict: You'll have a hard time finding this much ghee for the price elsewhere.
pros: Tin Star's tasty ghee is easy to cook with, and can entice even the pickiest eaters
It has a slightly nutty flavor and isn't too different from butter, taste-wise
cons: This brand seems more susceptible to graininess and hardening

customer_reviews.title: I reacted to this like dairy.
customer_reviews.text: I reacted to this like dairy.. became congested after eating repeated occasions. Ghee is meant to be protein and lactose free and my reaction is normally to whey and less so to lactose.
customer_reviews.author: Americankiwi

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible results.
customer_reviews.text: We are tempted to give this product a 4 out of 5 stars due to the fact that the cap is very difficult to remove. Besides that small factor, we love this product. We see that the cap must be preserving the product if it takes all of our strength to open it every time we use it, so we are delighted to share our enthusiasm pertaining to health and convenience. I should also mention that this is a fantastic product for cast iron! People need to become more aware of ghee! Thank you for this excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Adam H.

customer_reviews.title: More versatile than butter but with butter flavor
customer_reviews.text: Ghee is hard to find where we live. It can be used with or in lieu of olive oil in stir-fries and sautes, adding butter flavor to everything. Because milk solids are removed, it can be used where you need a hot skillet. Because it's organic and grass-fed, I know I can trust it to be pure.Ghee is great melted on a grilled steak or on hot vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne H. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great value
customer_reviews.text: This Ghee tastes great and doesn't affect me, as some ghees do. I am allergic to casein, and this ghee is certified casein free and does not harm me. I can enjoy buttery flavor for my steaks and stir-fry meals without the "flare ups" I get when I eat something that causes inflammation in my body. This is a great product and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious and healthier than butter as far as what I've read if you are avoiding dairy. Does not taste any different than regular butter to me. I do find I'm using less but I don't know for sure it's actually richer tasting.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to have color like peanut butter?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several ghee brands, with this company being my first. I have just received my jar and it does not look anything like previously purchased ghee. Should it look muddy with this discoloration on the bottom if jar? I’m used to my ghee looking brighter and yellow, not like peanut butter. I have not opened the jar, to smell, but the sell by date says 07/2019. I’m thinking I should return for a newer jar. The smaller jar is comparing to what I currently have which is more consistent t to other brands I’ve purchssed, and by a different brand/vendor.
customer_reviews.author: swilliams4life

customer_reviews.title: Grainy is perhaps the best way to describe it
customer_reviews.text: I don't find the nutty taste that Ghee is know for to be present in this brand. It also had an odd texture- visual and to touch. Grainy is perhaps the best way to describe it. Doesn't affect cooking- but the flavor is missing. I also use this with coconut oil in my coffee and I was not as happy as I was with Eat Good Fat ghee or my homemade ghee.
customer_reviews.author: Tunamuffin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ghee
customer_reviews.text: If a product doesn't say "100% grassfed" but only "grassfed", then you don't know what percentage of their diet was actually grass. This product is 100% grassfed, organic, and delicious. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Nor

customer_reviews.title: the best ghee I've found so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried about 10 different ghees for my daily bulletproof coffee and this one is at the top of my list! The jar seals very well so there is no leakage in shipping (that has happened for at least 3 products). While the jar seals well, it is not difficult to unscrew. The ghee tastes great without any grittiness and and dissolves instantly. I have used it a few times to cook chicken and it works great with that too. I like that it is from 100% grassfed cows and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: OMGhee!
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried ghee and wow, what great flavor and versatility! I especially love that this product is organic, non-GMO and from Amish Farms. I was very impressed with the amount I got for the price - it will definitely last a long time. I used some in my zucchini bread recipe today, replacing 1/2 the oil with melted ghee, and it turned out excellent.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Fransen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this ghee for years now and it is by far the best I’ve found. I have a very clean diet, and for someone with a dairy sensitivity to casein, it’s important to me that they test for both casein and lactose and use quality butter. I’ve tried so many ghee here and there, but nothing compares and I keep coming back!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It's ghee-licious!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this. It's so good that we've put a date on the jar to see how quickly we go through it! Our last jar of ghee was from our local Trader J's. This is so superior, there's no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: CM10014

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and a good amount for the price. One caution - it is very hard to remove from the jar once it has been refrigerated. Not sure how I will bet it out of the bottom of the jar.
customer_reviews.author: cmmeri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Service - Wonderful Products!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product once I learned about it through the Whole30 program. I had a slight issue with delivery; however, Leslie and the whole Tin Star Foods team were absolutely wonderful in handling the situation. My husband and I are gradually switching ourselves over from butter to ghee, and plan to use this item and other Tin Star Foods items moving forward. Again, thank you so much for the wonderful customer service and products - you've gained a faithful customer!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Great component for bullet proof coffee
customer_reviews.text: Im using it to make bulletproof coffee and it worked really well! It tasted great and my energy levels were good, and my workouts were beter! I used it with the bulletproof coffee made in a french press and MCT oil.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wawrzyniak

customer_reviews.title: Meh taste, weird texture
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated the texture of this brand is weird (runny/watery & gritty). I will use it up but not reorder. I am now using ghee and brown butter from Pure Traditions and have been very pleased with the taste and texture of both.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff but air pocket left jar half full :(
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely a huge fan of Tin Star Ghee. I’ve buying it since the beginning. I love it. But, I was disappointed to find a huge air pocket in my jar. I feel like I lost almost a half of the jar. This will not keep me from purchasing again and again...it just made me very sad. I’m doing a Whole30 and use ghee for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints with this ghee
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase a different ghee but Amazon doesn't carry that brand anymore so based on other reviews I switched to this one. It seems good but not sure if I would order again or try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie St. Germaine

customer_reviews.title: 29 oz not in jar due to air pocket???
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS STUFF! BUT....when I broke through top layer of Ghee in 29 oz jar there was a HUGE air pocket, I'm assuming, so the jar only had approximately half of the product inside. Please see photos. Please help! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Couponcat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, real food item
customer_reviews.text: Been making bullet proof coffee with this. My hub's down 25 pounds. OK, not just cuz the coffee, but, yay, for quality food stuffs!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Best and most delicious product out there!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars! Absolutely amazing ghee. Hands down the most well spent money on high quality fats possible. The brown butter has to be one of the most delicious fats I've ever eaten. I am very sensitive to lactose and have had no reactions whatsoever to this ghee. If you are interested in a high quality, delicious, and nutritious fat I can't recommend anything better than Tin Star!!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine R.

customer_reviews.title: Its aroma! Hummm!! Yummm!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it..love it..love it.. it tastes great. It has a nice smell. I use it on everything. It reminds me of old fasioned butter back in old days when foods were real foods. I will order more. I hope they dont rise the price
customer_reviews.author: Rascal_626

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Ridiciously overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very consistent, perfect flavor. It was expensive to begin with but over the top now. Every week the price goes up. Will go back to making my own. Sorry Tin Star Foods you've priced yourselves out of my generous budget.
customer_reviews.author: a moralist

customer_reviews.title: I wonder if this is normal or I just got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: This product has a sour taste and smell to it while other ghee I was able to get don't. I wonder if this is normal or I just got a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: Kuan-Teh L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: People!! This is the best tasting Ghee money can buy!!! We use this for everything. When friend come over they always ask what I use because everything taste so good :)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Zapotoczny

customer_reviews.title: This is very high quality ghee, most likely the best on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this ghee, and this comes from someone who has tried a few.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can have that "butter" flavor even on ...
customer_reviews.text: Being casein intolerant, this is the only Ghee I can tolerate. I love that I can have that "butter" flavor even on my restricted diet. I've ordered dozens of jars and the quality is always consistent.
customer_reviews.author: MomLadyOR

customer_reviews.title: Light and tasty for coffee
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have had both I would say I love the taste of Tin Star brown butter over the Ghee because of the more pronounced caramel flavor. I personally don't have to have gluten free or non GMO, but it is excellent and I would recommend if you need it. I love Tin Star products.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and consistency! Excellent product for use with the BulletProof diet.
customer_reviews.author: John McBee

customer_reviews.title: yummy ghee for me
customer_reviews.text: This ghee was recommended on a blog for Whole30 compliant foods. I have been very satified in using the ghee in place of butter in our meals. A little goes a long way. The taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting Ghee. I've tried other brands and after having this Tin Star Ghee, now I know what how good Ghee could taste. Love it! but i'm sad because I've been trying to reorder the 32oz Organic - Grass-Fed Ghee from Tin Star and it's not available : (. cm
customer_reviews.author: CHM

customer_reviews.title: but I'm sure it's great for just cooking purposes
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't have the nutty flavor that other ghee's have. I wouldn't order it again for that reason, but I'm sure it's great for just cooking purposes. (I used it for coffee)
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know what to expect but I haven't been disappointed. It doesn't take much so it goes a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is,the first time I have used ghee butter & I'm really enjoying it. I didn't know what to expect but I haven't been disappointed. It doesn't take much so it goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: c Russ

customer_reviews.title: This is a good brand and my digestive system tolerates it well
customer_reviews.text: I have some problems with casein and whey. This is a good brand and my digestive system tolerates it well. It gives me the opportunity to have a little of the buttery taste on my veggies that I haven't had since finding out I can't eat butter.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the jar lid
customer_reviews.text: While the ghee is high quality, the jar is not. It's very difficult to open if it gets too stuck. At one point, I thought I might never be able to open it and ghee is too expensive to waste. Shipping was on time and undamaged, but the jar will prevent me from buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: LizWaltersATL

customer_reviews.title: Loved the taste, but shipping ruined its consistency.
customer_reviews.text: It's good-tasting, and good quality. I live in Texas, and when it was delivered it was melted. It's never returned to a solid state, which is a bummer because I look forward to spreading it like butter. It's also the reason for getting 3 stars. I like that it's pastured and grass-fed, so I'll prob buy again, but I'll wait till it cools off here so it doesn't lose its consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Good for cooking, However the only ones I've found so far that taste delicious right off the spoon are Bulletproof and Ancient Organics.
customer_reviews.author: ResearchingMom

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars !!
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made. I'd give 10 stars if I could. Ghee will stay good for 12 months after opening in the refrigerator. ( ghee hardens in the fridge just FYI ). Fantastic company.
customer_reviews.author: HMC702

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is the best ghee I've ever tasted. My kitchen won't be without it! I love the flavor of it, love that the butter is of excellent quality, and love that it's made with love by a wonderful small business with top-notch customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Callee

customer_reviews.title: I use this ghee for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using Tin Star Organic Ghee, I don't used anything else! It is as delicious with scrambled eggs as it is with stir-fried veggies! It has replaced any other oil or butter that I used. It tastes wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot but it doesn't quite replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot but it doesn't quite replace the taste of butter. It is good but the flavor takes a little getting used to. A great option if you are trying to go dairy free but still want something like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Review of Tinstar Ghee
customer_reviews.text: This tastes very good. Easy to use and has a rich buttery flavor, but does not set off my dairy intolerance. Will definitely buy it again. This was an impulse buy from a buy of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hemmerich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Tastes like butter! I’ve been missing butter. They did a swell job with packing this too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very delicious and easy to use. This is my first order of ghee and I like it more than butter now. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: While the taste was great, I did not care for the gritty texture at all.
customer_reviews.author: jacintha white

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not very familiar with ghee, but bought this for making stovetop popcorn. Works great and tastes great. Makes great popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Winn1357911

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product as described. Delivered on time in minimal packaging. Fresh, tasty, quality grassfed ghee. I will repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Swaffar

customer_reviews.title: Great price and takes great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and takes great. Not too smokey like some of the other brands. I even successfully flew to china without it breaking in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: He first jar I bought was great so I purchased another. The contents of the 2nd jar had a brown hue to it and at room temperature the solidified center could slosh in the brown jar when moved. This is not the Brown Butter that they produce but the pure Ghee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flavor. I use it in my bulletproof coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flavor. I use it in my bulletproof coffee and we also started using ghee for cooking and found out that we really like how it taste.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tin Star Foids - First choice
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product and was pleasantly surprised that it arrived so quickly. Packaging was great. Nothing broken.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and tasty to cook with
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor and tasty to cook with. I just wish you offered ghee with salt added, so it would taste more like butter. I am using it while on the Whole30 diet, in place of butter for cooking. I am just adding the salt to it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is representative of the product or not, but mine arrived with a grainy consistency and an almost sour smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's great on eggs and veggies
customer_reviews.text: My first time using ghee. It's great on eggs and veggies. Spread it on avocado toast. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Not the same everytime
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one jar and was satisfied with it so I purchased a second one. The second one was watery and grainy and nothing like the first one I had purchased. I attempted to return it but it was non returnable and I wasn't able to contact anyone about it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer knepp

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, Excellent Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality ghee ...I've tried many brands. Using it every day and loving the flavor, consistency and way it combines in recipes! Never rancid tasting- very sweet
customer_reviews.author: P. Franchini

customer_reviews.title: Good Ghee--Grass Fed and Organic Is Great
customer_reviews.text: This is good grass-fed ghee. I think I like their original grass-fed ghee a little better. It has more of a buttery-ghee taste and smell. The organic is a little weak, but still very good. Glad that it's made from grass-fed cows and it's organic. Two thumbs-up for them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me not miss my butter!
customer_reviews.text: Never used ghee before, but since I am on the Paleo diet and I miss my butter, thought I'd give it a try. It is delicious and has certainly perked up my mealtimes! I use it to cook with, put on my veggies, eggs and anything else that a spot of butter would call for. Anxious to try the brown butter next
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, high quality. I've been using it in everything, it's pretty much replaced my grass-fed butter.
customer_reviews.author: Shimska

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use ghee in my coffee. Lots of energy. Taste great
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Try it you will like it and it is organic.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying so hard to eat better and clean. So many philosophies, but trying KETO. This was a great purchase and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Killinger-Humes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a friend, she and her husband use where you'd normally use butter or lard.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Kitchen Stable
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and good packaging. One of my favorite kitchen staples. Very glad to be able to restock via Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Rainya Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish it came in a larger jar! I do keto and this product is an essential ingredient for anyone living a LCHF lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: This stuff taste good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff taste good and it works good to cook with
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Gee is delicious! I hadn't used it before and really like it. Nice big jar size too.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Seidler

customer_reviews.title: Liquid at Room Temp
customer_reviews.text: Delicious as always! My only complaint with this order is that it is liquid at room temperature, while other jars I’ve had in the past are a creamy consistency at room temperature. Not sure why the difference, but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Jmuash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional ghee that definitely meets my needs and taste bud experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: We had another ghee and liked it, so we tried Tin Star Foods Ghee, and loved it! It's great for cooking and using in place of butter, for those who have dairy allergies. Great taste and flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Luscious ghee!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful bright yellow, creamy consistency and luscious taste make it my go-to for all my Paleo and Keto recipes. And I love that it's made by a small family business. Five stars--would give it 10 if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Procita

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's so easy to work with for all of my cooking needs. I alternate between this and the brown butter version for my animal fats.
customer_reviews.author: MrsA

customer_reviews.title: Delicious nutty flavor. Ships well protected in an extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious nutty flavor. Ships well protected in an extra box.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Levy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Goodness
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and I like that it is from a small company. I know I can depend on this product being consistently delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie0824

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and LOVE this Ghee. Nice big jar too! I use a lot of Ghee and I went through my first jar pretty fast, so I ordered two more jars. Good to keep one on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Genre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: OK but want more flavor
customer_reviews.text: Lacked flavor, so good if you don’t want too much butter flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieBell

customer_reviews.title: This really does taste like
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying ghee. This really does taste like butter
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Foodie Husband Approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband who claimed to be disgusted by vegetables before, guzzles down bowls of whatever vegetables I roast in the oven with Tin Star Foods Ghee and Himalayan salt. So glad I found a way to feed him healthy foods without the torture.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Diaz

customer_reviews.title: It tastes great. It is wonderful to cook with
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great. It is wonderful to cook with. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LESWOMAN

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really smooth, great tasting ghee. I use it in place of butter for many dishes and really enjoy it in my coffee!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my fingers crossed...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to mix with coconut oil in my coffee after seeing the difference in my high school friend's complexion. It was amazing!!! It's too soon to notice, but I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Meddy's MindTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cook everything. Also great melted over popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nejedly

customer_reviews.title: Liked it. Will probably just use butter because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked it. Will probably just use butter because of the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ghee on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, the quality, the taste! We use it on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Porhola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality ghee. I'm extremely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bulletproof coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I use it mainly for Bulletproof coffee. Really appreciate the good price and quality of organic AND grass fed ghee.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good Ghee, Looked yellow. Great taste too.I purchased again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ghee
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in secure box, perfect each time. And they e-mailed me wonderful recipes.
customer_reviews.author: MJKY

customer_reviews.title: Really cool stuff. This is the first time I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool stuff. This is the first time I have tried it and it is just like butter only better
customer_reviews.author: kathy golie

customer_reviews.title: Good Ghee
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for frying, seasoning vegetables. Good taste.
customer_reviews.author: TerriL

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with this product. I had not had or used ghee before but needed it for a new diet I am on. Seems to be of very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: R McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Put it in your coffee in the mornings for added benefit
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Delicious :)
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try Ghee for a while since I know it's nutritional properties are amazing. I have to say I'm very impressed with this one, it taste delicious! And I use it in many different ways even in my coffee :) loved this product! Great seller too it arrived very fast and didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina P.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor that this ghee adds to my cooking.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Tin Star Ghee!!! Just wish it was available in larger jars (like the brown butter ghee).
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: recommended I buy Ghee
customer_reviews.text: I have never had this before but now have to give up dairy and my dr. recommended I buy Ghee. I liked that this one was organic but I had no idea if this would taste good or not. I have no comparison. I have used it on veggies, to scramble eggs and on a piece of GF toast. It was delicious and I think if not eaten alone you'd be hard pressed to know it wasn't just butter. Yes, it is clarified butter so it's still butter, but you know what I mean. It tastes GREAT and it's good for me so the only issue is price. But I still give it 5 stars because it tastes GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: MH56

customer_reviews.title: Dark color and sediment
customer_reviews.text: The last shipment had a darker color and there was bottom sediment when melted. 2 jars we couldn't consume. Must have been a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: First time purchase and very pleased. Tim Star Ghee has a rich butter flavor and smell. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: On my second jar! This stuff is great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I opened it up and took a whiff and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up and took a whiff and it absolutely smelled RANCID. No other word for it. To make sure it wasn't simply that I wasn't used to ghee, I opened a jar of another brand that I had also purchased. That was a bit strong, but still pleasant. I wouldn't use Tin Star on my food and intend to find a way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn Kopecky

product_meta.title: Organic Ghee by Tin Star Foods (29 oz): USDA-Certified Organic Clarified Butter from 100% Grassfed Cows | Paleo and Whole 30 Approved | Lactose-Free
feature_bullets: 100% Grass-fed, USDA-certified Organic, and non-GMO clarified butter. Ghee is a healthy and delicious alternative to regular butter and vegetable oils.
Whole30 & 21 Day Sugar Detox compliant. Gluten-Free. Paleo.

Replace cooking oil and butter with Tin Star Organic Ghee to brighten your favorite recipes. Add Ghee to warm tortillas, over vegetables, over a bed of rice, on bread, or any other dish you’d like to add flavor to.
Add Tin Star Organic Ghee to coffee for a delicious, nutrient-dense and buttery boost or pair it with an afternoon scone.
Made in Texas in small batches— the purest & highest quality handcrafted ghee on the market!
